name: HSP_ACCT_CONS_SP_BAL
description: The HSP_ACCT_CONS_SP_BAL table contains information about Received Self-Pay HARs as well as some total balance amounts. As a partial example, this includes core information such as the balance type, visit location, type of visit as well as total balance information such as total charges, insurance payments etc.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the hosp acct record.

columns.name: CONS_SP_BAL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of balance for a self-pay target account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_BAL_WTHDRW_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: This item contains the reason a self-pay target HAR was withdrawn or marked for withdrawal.
entries: Sent to PB bad debt in non-SBO AR Service Area.

columns.name: CONS_SP_BAL_WTHDRW_STS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item contains the status of a self-pay target HAR that has been withdrawn or marked for withdrawal.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_CHG
columns.description: Total amount of self-pay charges on this self-pay target account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_INS_PMT
columns.description: Total amount of insurance payments on this self-pay target account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_INS_RFND
columns.description: Total amount of insurance refunds on this self-pay target account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_INS_ADJ
columns.description: Total amount of insurance adjustments on this self-pay target account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_SP_PMT
columns.description: Total amount of payments on this self-pay target account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_SP_RFND
columns.description: Total amount of self-pay refunds on this self-pay target account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_SP_ADJ
columns.description: Total amount of self-pay adjustments on this self-pay target account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_INS_BAL
